description: This file sets up an AI agent with AWS Bedrock model and tools, downloads an image, reads its bytes, and prompts the agent to analyze the image and provide news.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent configured with a model and tools to process requests.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image with content and format.

classes.name: AwsBedrock
classes.description: AWS Bedrock model integration for the agent.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for performing web searches via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: download_image
methods.description: Downloads an image from a URL to a specified output path.
